recipes.name: Lemon Spinach Rissotto
recipes.ingredients: arborio rice, olive oil, shallots, spinach, lemon, chicken stock, mascarpone
recipes.preparation: Cook shallots in olive oil for 25 secs, place arborio rice in same pan, put 1/4 cup chicken stock and replenish stock every 4 mins for at least 25 mins, then mix in cheese, spinach, lemon juice and zest

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.ingredients: 4 large egg yolks, 1/2cup granulated sugar, 3/4 cup heavy cream, 1 cup mascarpone, espresso, rum, ladyfingers, bittersweet chocolate
recipes.preparation: whisk eggs and sugar, in separate bowl whip cream, sugar, and mascarpone, combine espresso and rum in separate bowl
